content: fioriti socks yarn approximately 100g of any 4ply sock yarn sample was knit with wool & forest sock colour blush 75% wool merino 25% nylon 100g = 425 m/464yrds gauge 30 stitches and 40 row in stockinette = 10 cm / 4 inch needles dpns or circular needle in size 2 5 mm / us 1 5 or size needed to get gauge sizes s 56 sts m 64 sts l 72 sts on page 6 you can find a one-page cheat-sheet to print if you already have a favourite heel and toe pattern instructions all sizes are knit the same way if the stitch count varies for the different sizes sizes are marked in brackets and highlighted in a different colour like so and so follow the same instructions for the right and left sock stitch abbreviations co cast on round s round s decrease decrease ssk slip 2 sts knitwise knit two as one 1 st decrease dpns double pointed needles st sts stitch stitches increase increase yo yarn over 1 st increase k knit k2tog knit 2 stitches together as one 1 st decrease flpk -
